core.comp3111

Class Transform

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.comp3111.Transform

  • public class Transform
extends java.lang.Object
    Transform - A class containing methods to transform a DataTable. It stores the tables which will be transformed (dataTable) and the transform parameters. Filtering parameter includes a string which is the base column to check filter against (columnFilter), another string for the filter operator (operatorFilter), and a string which will be formatted to a Number functioning as a value to check filter against (numberFilter). Split parameter consists of only an array which will be used as the ratio to split the table into.

      Construct - Create a Transform object by giving the DataTable to transform

      Get the float array which will be used as the ratio of resultant DataTables when splitting, for instance, {99.1, 0.9}.

        public java.lang.String getNumberFilter()

        Returns:

      • randomSplit

        public DataTable[] randomSplit()
                        throws TransformException,
                               DataTableException
        Split the dataTable of the class into two instances of DataTables according to the parameter percentSplit.
        Returns:
        DataTable[] The two resultant DataTables
        Throws:
        TransformException - - It throws TransformException if the percentSplit does not have two elements, or the sum of elements of percentSplit is not equal to 100.
        DataTableException - - It throws DataTableException if the method fails to add one of the columns into the new DataTables.

      • filterData

        public DataTable filterData()
                     throws TransformException
        Filter the DataTable according to the parameters columnFilter, numberFilter, and operatorFilter.
        Returns:
        DataTable The new DataTable containing elements that passed the filter
        Throws:
        TransformException - - It throws TransformException if one of the filtering parameters is null, or it fails to format the data inside the column into a Number array, or it fails to format the numberFilter into float
